context_of_use: The admin manages product records to ensure availability and accurate pricing.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Ensure products are available and priced correctly.
description: Create and update product records including pricing and availability.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has permissions to manage products.
postconditions: Product records are created or updated successfully.
assumptions: The admin has the necessary permissions to create and update products.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the admin to create new products.
The system shall allow the admin to update product prices.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the process for handling product deletions.
main_flow: 1. Admin creates a new product → System records the new product.
2. Admin updates product prices → System updates the pricing information.
